# Course Projects

**Statistics M254** | Spring 2024

-   [Cell Type Annotation in scDNA-seq Data](https://jacenai.github.io/Biostatistics/Final_Project.html)

    -   In this project, I analyze two datasets: BoneMarrow and Pancreas and apply the [Seurat](https://satijalab.org/seurat/) package to identify cell types in single-cell DNA-seq data. I tune the parameters to optimize the clustering results and visualize the cell types using umap plots.

-   scRNA-seq Data Normalization Methods Comparison[\[real data\]](https://jacenai.github.io/Biostatistics/Normalizaion_comparision&Derivative_general_scRNA_model.html#q3.)[\[simulated data\]](https://jacenai.github.io/Biostatistics/Normalizaion_comparision&Derivative_general_scRNA_model.html#section-2) and [Derivative on General scRNA-seq Model](https://jacenai.github.io/Biostatistics/Normalizaion_comparision&Derivative_general_scRNA_model.html#part-2-simulated-data)
-  Dimension Reduction Methods: [PCA](https://jacenai.github.io/Biostatistics/254_dimen_reduc.html#question-1), [GLM-PCA, MDS](https://jacenai.github.io/Biostatistics/254_dimen_reduc.html#question-5), NMF, ICA, PNMF, t-SNE, and UMAP
- Clustering Algorithms: [k-means, k-means++, hierarchical clustering, Seurat clustering](https://jacenai.github.io/Biostatistics/254_Clustering&Evaluation#question-2), and Evaluation: [ARI, Silhouette Score](https://jacenai.github.io/Biostatistics/254_Clustering&Evaluation#question-3)
